statements: SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT member_id, subscription_fee FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE subscription_fee > 100;
SELECT class_id, start_date, end_date FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT subscription_id, member_id, class_id, subscription_fee FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY subscription_fee DESC;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE class_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE subscription_fee > 50;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) AS subscription_count FROM membership_subscriptions GROUP BY class_id HAVING subscription_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_id, member_id, class_id FROM membership_subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscription_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_records WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT subscription_id, member_id, class_id FROM membership_subscriptions INNER JOIN payment_records ON membership_subscriptions.subscription_id = payment_records.subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = '12345'
SELECT member_id, class_id FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM membership_subscriptions WHERE member_id = '54321' AND class_id = '999'
SELECT * FROM payment_records WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT subscription_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_records GROUP BY subscription_id
SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM group_fitness_classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM members WHERE membership_type = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM group_fitness_classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM group_fitness_classes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE membership_type = 'premium' ORDER BY membership_start_date ASC;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, membership_start_date FROM members JOIN payments ON members.member_id = payments.member_id WHERE amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, member_id, class_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor FROM classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT m.member_name, c.class_name, s.start_date FROM members m JOIN subscriptions s ON m.member_id = s.member_id JOIN classes c ON s.class_id = c.class_id WHERE s.end_date < CURDATE();
SELECT p.subscription_id, p.amount, s.start_date, s.end_date FROM payments p JOIN subscriptions s ON p.subscription_id = s.subscription_id WHERE p.amount > 1000;

SELECT m.member_name, m.email, c.class_name, c.instructor, p.amount FROM members m JOIN subscriptions s ON m.member_id = s.member_id JOIN classes c ON s.class_id = c.class_id JOIN payments p ON s.subscription_id = p.subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_schedule FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_name = 'Yoga' ORDER BY class_schedule DESC;
SELECT member_name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_schedule FROM fitness_classes JOIN subscriptions ON fitness_classes.class_id = subscriptions.class_id WHERE subscriptions.member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT member_name, attendance_date FROM members JOIN attendance ON members.member_id = attendance.member_id WHERE attendance_date = '2023-01-15';
